recentWork.title: Add documentation philosophy guide
recentWork.description: Establish a clear structure for organizing documentation at Bolt Foundry: - content/ for user-facing documentation (docs and blogs) - memos/ for builder documentation (guides and plans) - decks/ for structured behaviors and specifications  This philosophy document: - Defines the three-part documentation structure - Explains the users vs builders distinction - Clarifies evergreen vs dated documentation - Documents naming conventions (date prefixes for plans and blogs) - Positions documentation as essential for team clarity and focus  The new structure ensures nobody (AI or human, customer or team member) is confused about what we're working on, keeping everyone's attention focused on understanding what they need to know to work with us
recentWork.author: randallb
